findings.liver: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 3 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Stones measuring up to 1.5 cm in the distended gallbladder. Mild gallbladder wall edema. No pericholecystic free fluid.
findings.pancreas: The head, body, and tail of the pancreas are within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilatation.
findings.kidneys: Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis. Right kidney measures 10.1 cm.
findings.retroperitoneum: The visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
findings.aorta: The aorta measures 2.36 cm in the proximal portion, 2.05 cm in mid portion and 1.62 cm in the distal abdominal aorta with mild calcified atherosclerotic plaque.
